projects.description: Engineered a responsive design, optimizing web page for a range of devices from smartphones to desktops. experiences.description: Developed web projects using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, increasing user engagement by 25% and site visits by 30%. Resolved JavaScript and CSS compatibility issues, cutting downtime by 40%, enhancing site functionality.
